name: Stick Man Fight 3
description: Test yourself for dexterity: dodge strikes, overcome many obstacles! Lasers, blasters, grenades, flamethrowers and much more - everything will go to play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
